comments.author: mreavy@mozilla.com

comments.text: I'm not sure there's anything to do here. The reftest expectations were updated in Bug 1461046, but they seem to set expectations that match what the test is doing now: https://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/source/layout/reftests/css-invalid/select/reftest.list#10. Likewise, when I review the intermittent-failures report, I don't see any failures past June 1. This looks resolved to me.
comments.author: bwerth@mozilla.com
